SARAS INDIAN FAST FOOD RESTAURANT
15 Sukhumvit Soi 20 (near Windsor Hotel) Bangkok Thailand Phone: 02 401 8484
CATEGORY: FULLY VEGETARIAN. HOURS: Mon - Fri: 8am - 10:30pm Sat - Sun: 8am - 11pm DESCRIPTION: SARAS is an Indian Fast Food outlet encompassing cuisines from East to West and North to South of India under one roof. In addition to this, we offer Thai vegetarian food to add to the unique experience. As a family business, we understand the importance of gathering together and eating well. Our freshness, taste and newly renovated décor welcomes you to catch up with a friend or enjoy a relaxing meal in a fine dining setup that is designed to entertain you in every essence. Our team of chefs boasting of expertise in cuisines from different parts of India have a common goal. They are focused and committed on quality, dedicated service and customer satisfaction. Our Vision is "Excellence in Food Making" without compromising on quality and maintaining flawless consistency. Come and savor traditional flavors from all over India. CUISINE: Chinese, Fast Food, Northern Indian, South Indian and Pizza.
At SARAS, we offer complete only vegetarian food variety. We provide huge choices and many of them very unique (rare to find in Bangkok). Saras menu covers from "Snacks" Chaat Chowpati, to Indian Chinese, South Indian, Tandoori Tikkas-n-Kababs, Main Course covers from North Indian, Rajhasthani, Gujrati, Jains meals and last but not the least rich delicious Thai food. All these prepared by the skilled Chefs "Maharaj" We understand the Hindu rituals/customs and provide regional food for special Indian community example :- Marwari's, Gujrati's, Masheshwari's and Jains, etc. MEALS SERVED: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch and Dinner. SERVICE: Counter, Juice Bar, Take-out, Delivery and Catering. SPECIALTIES: Rajhasthani Thalis, Gujrati Thalis, Indian Sweets (Desserts), South Indian, Thai Food, Indian Chinese, Beverages. FEATURES: Fully Non-Smoking, Wheelchair Accessible, Free Parking, Licensed, Free Wi-Fi, Children's Menu and Groups Welcome.
ATMOSPHERE: Casual and Child-Friendly. CAPACITY: Between 50 - 99 seats. RESERVATIONS: Not Necessary, Recommended. VEGDINING PARTNER: We're very pleased to be a VegDining Partner . CREDIT CARDS: We accept
MasterCard and Visa. DIRECTIONS: If coming from Asoke junction, after crossing take first right or ask any one about Windsor Hotel.
PARKING: We have space for 15 car parks but if the parking is full, customers can park on 2nd floor of Rembrandt Hotel and we will get the parking slip stamped (Free no charge)
